SCTX:
Begin UlfgarScript

Short NoLore

;This script gets Ulfgar to utter his dying words to the player

short greetonce

if ( greetonce == -1 )
	Return
endif

if ( GetJournalIndex BM_BrodirGrove >= 40 )
	if ( GetHealth <=50 )
		if ( greetonce == 0 )
		Journal BM_BrodirGrove 90
		ForceGreeting
		set greetonce to -1
		endif
	endif
endif

End
